course_description: An introduction to important issues and problems in the ethical conduct of business: What is the proper goal of business in a democratic society? How should businesses protect against conflicts of interest? [Prior to Fall 2010, this course carried the number PHIL 202.]
sections: Class Nbr: 1020, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MTWThF 11:30a-12:50p, Instructor: J. Callahan, Status: Open
